game.name: LetDeco Desktop
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A cute idle-crafting game tucked away in the corner of the screen. Visit regions where diverse materials are found, and decorate your home with furniture you make yourself!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cute idle-crafting game tucked away in the corner of the screen. Visit regions where diverse materials are found, and decorate your home with furniture you make yourself!
